name: Escape from Belluca's Bistro
description:
For hundreds of years, pastakind of all manner has been ruthlessly devoured by man. This is a retelling of that fateful day in 2021 when Artie Bucco escaped from that hellish eatery.

As you no doubt know by now, they went on to found pastociety and ruled for one hundred forty-three prosperous years. They were loved by all: dried, fresh, whole-wheat, multigrain, semolina, and countless more shapes and varieties.

Never forget Artie's powerful words that day: AFTER THIS, WE REBUILD

Each stick moves one end of the noodle.

Each trigger lifts up one end of the noodle.

(A) lifts middle of noodle

(X) + left stick moves middle of noodle.

(Y) to toggle grip/release lock for climbing.

Bumpers to move camera.
